attributes.action: not enter property and measure property improvements to increase Council Tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition if you feel any way threatened by the action of the State against the rights of the individual in this matter.

It is unreasonable to 

(a) enter peoples property to view home improvement in order to revise tax valuations. 

(b) to tax a persons willingness to improve the appearance of their property and therefore the public amenity of the immediate area around the property.

(c) it is unreasonable to enter property and gather personal data  where it cannot be proven that the person calling is sufficiently trained, does not represent a threat or a danger to the occupant and / or will misuse the information gathered.

(d) it is unreasonable for the Government to collect and store details about the property, its security and  contents of peoples homes without sufficient guarantees of security and respect for privacy.
